# InfinityArts #

The following codes materia.  It will overwrite your existing materia inventory.  Apply in order shown.

Add 1 of each materia (52)
95000000 00001840
4A000000 00010901
400C0020 00000000
4A000004 00002711
400C0020 00000001
4A000008 0000270F
400C0020 00000000

4A000180 00010901
40070020 00000000
4A000184 00002AF9
40070020 00000001
4A000188 0000270F
40070020 00000000

4A000260 00010901
40060020 00000000
4A000264 00002EE1
40060020 00000001
4A000268 0000270F
40060020 00000000

4A000320 00010901
40120020 00000000
4A000324 000032C9
40120020 00000001
4A000328 0000270F
40120020 00000000

4A000560 00010901
40090020 00000000
4A000564 000036B1
40090020 00000001
4A000568 0000270F
40090020 00000000

Copies those 52 materia and pastes in slot 53-104, sets order and time for all 104 slots
95000000 00001840
58000000 00000680
58000680 00000000
4A000018 00000001
40680020 00000001
4A000010 5E970000
40680020 00000050

Apply this for 3x of each (to slot 156)
95000000 00001840
58000000 00000680
58000D00 00000000
4A000018 00000001
4D000020 00000001
4A000010 5E970000
4D000020 00000050

# khuong #
??? - not sure what this does.. (might be a troll)
80081350 80081350
80081350 80081350

Notes: that'll skip 1 persons weapoins
whoever is last
400345E6 0000000A
40160002 00000000

# Skiller #
95000000 00034DD0
4A000000 5E97A752  <-- Time
48000018 00000001 <-- Plus 1 each time 
4A000008 00002300 <-- ID start 
48000018 00000001 <-- Plus 1 each time 
4A00000C 00002300 <- Amount Start 
48000018 00000001  <-- Plus 1 each time 
4A000010 00000000 <-- Category 
48000018 00000000
